description.en: This frozen beauty follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: This frozen beauty follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: Um misterioso espírito do gelo que segue seu mestre e coleta itens caídos no chão.
description.cns: 这个冰冻美人跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Junger Schneegeist, die dir überall hin folgt und deine Items einsammelt.
description.fi: This frozen beauty follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: This frozen beauty follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: invoque un mignon petit Esprit d'Azria qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis.
description.id: Sicantik yang setia mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: This frozen beauty follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: 雪少女ルミアを召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.nl: This frozen beauty follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.pl: This frozen beauty follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ru: Маленькая снежная королева, которая грациозно следует за вами и подбирает предметы.
description.sp: Esta belleza congelada sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: This frozen beauty follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.th: frozen beautyที่ตามเจ้านายของมันไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.vi: Vẻ đẹp băng giá này đi theo chủ nhân của nó xung quanh và nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi.
